Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Acid Splash
Traits.Description: Attacks deal piercing [fray] damage on hit or miss to all foes in range 2 of the target as an area effect.

Traits.Name: Insulated
Traits.Description: Ignores dangerous terrain, difficult terrain, and terrain effects.

Actions.Name: Spray
Actions.Blightboost: Attack target explodes in a blast 1 area around them, shoving characters 1 away from them and dealing piercing fray damage to all characters.

Actions.Name: Sticky Solution
Actions.Description: Area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of combat, or until this ability is used again.
